Complimentary Analyst Publication: Testing Quality at Speed
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
The demand for speed and quality is unprecedented, and continuous delivery is the Holy Grail in terms of delivering new and better applications and features to your business faster. This affects all aspects of testing and means an unprecedented level of change. It’s time to jump-start a new testing process or accelerate the one you have now.
In this January 2015 Forrester Research Report “Five Must-Do’s for Testing Quality at Speed”, we believe that you will learn to improve your current delivery practices and gain some quick business wins. It will also help you on the path towards a mobile-first strategy, which has become increasingly important in the app development world.
You may access the full Forrester research note by downloading it from the sidebar.
Best regards,
Gerd Weishaar VP of Product Management
